description: These sweatpants aren't just comfortable in the front; they're designed for all-day comfort in the back too. The soft, fleece lining provides a luxurious feel against the skin, while the moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and dry. The relaxed fit with a gently tapered leg ensures a comfortable drape without being baggy.  Flatlock seams throughout minimize chafing, and the articulated knees allow for unrestricted movement.  These sweatpants also feature two deep back pockets, perfect for storing your essentials. Whether you're lounging at home or hitting the gym, these sweatpants will keep you comfortable and stylish from every angle.
